Home Football Casemiro's actions when Bruno took the penalty between Manchester United vs Forest showed how much this match meant.

Casemiro's actions when Bruno took the penalty between Manchester United vs Forest showed how much this match meant.

Football Emily · 27/08/2023 · Manchester United

﻿At Old Trafford, Man Utd overcame a 3-0 deficit to defeat Nottingham Forest 3-2, but the performance raised more concerns than it did answers.

Bruno Fernandes' penalty appeared to have gone in the net when Casemiro turned his back on the goal that Manchester United was attempting to score and knelt down on his haunches to witness the Stretford End's response.

When the audience exploded, Casmiro jumped up and pumped his hands, letting the emotion associated with being let out of prison loose. United finally had cause to celebrate at the conclusion of a terrible week. Even though it wasn't convincing, the outcome was sorely needed.
